# Overview
kbtbr uses R6 classes. 

# Authentication

# Setup
```{r kobo}
library(kbtbr)
base_url_v2 <- Sys.getenv("KBTBR_BASE_URL") # e.g. https://kobo.correlaid.org
token <- Sys.getenv("KBTBR_TOKEN")

kobo <- Kobo$new(base_url_v2, token)
kobo
```

```{r}
assets <- kobo$get_assets()
```

```{r}
surveys <- kobo$get_surveys()
```
